about_the_game: The RunGunJumpGun Original Digital Soundtrack comes with all of the thumping tracks featured in the game, and includes numerous "Cutting Room Floor" tracks. All tracks are available in High-Res MP3. Additionally this DLC acts as an upgrade path to the game's Special Atomik Edition, and thus also includes a Pack of Exclusive High-Resolution Wallpapers, including Original Cover Art created by famed artist El Huervo.
detailed_description: The RunGunJumpGun Original Digital Soundtrack comes with all of the thumping tracks featured in the game, and includes numerous "Cutting Room Floor" tracks. All tracks are available in High-Res MP3. Additionally this DLC acts as an upgrade path to the game's Special Atomik Edition, and thus also includes a Pack of Exclusive High-Resolution Wallpapers, including Original Cover Art created by famed artist El Huervo.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz +
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: RunGunJumpGun - Soundtrack/Special Edition Upgrade
